title: The Definitive Wolverine Comics Collection (.cbr, .cbz files)
description:
This collection contains over 550 Wolverine comics, including:

- All Wolverine regular series issues from issue #1 through 2014
- Annuals
- Crossovers
- Kitty Pride and Wolverine
- Marvel Universe vs Wolverine
- 30 Wolverine mini series and graphic novels
- 40 one shots
- Origin II
- Wolverine What Ifs
- Wolverine Origins
- Digital exclusives
- Miscellaneous extras
- And more

All issues are in either .cbz or .cbr format (except for five annuals which are in PDF format). I had to .rar the file because the path names for some files were so long that uTorrent was throwing an error when trying to create the torrent. If you wanted to pick and choose a few issues, I apologize for the inconvenience.

If you're a fan of Wolverine (and who isn't?), this should keep you busy for a while.

'Nuff said.

Cheers!
